question: The graph given below shows the mean average monthly temperatures (in °C) and means monthly rainfall (in cms) of a place: This graph is indicative of which one of the climatic zones of the world?
explanation: The tropical wet-dry climate is abbreviated Aw in the Köppen-Geiger-Pohl system. Temperatures in tropical wet-dry climate regions are high throughout the year but show a greater range than wet equatorial (Af) and Am climates (19–20 °C in winter and 24–27 °C in summer).
